section.title: Batli ya mfumo
section.para: The "System Log" link on the Admin page shows the log entries of the system, reverse chronologically sorted with most recent first (see figure below).
Kila mstari kwenye batli una mhuri wa muda, kipaumbele cha batli, kijenzi cha mfumo na ingizo la batli yenyewe.

note.para: System logs are available via the web interface only on Linux / Unix systems.
